recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A colorful, nutrient-packed stir-fry made with crisp, tender vegetables cooked in a savory soy-ginger sauce. Perfect for a quick and healthy meal that’s ready in minutes.

recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.description: A restaurant-style Indian delicacy, Paneer Butter Masala is a rich and creamy curry made with soft paneer cubes simmered in a luscious tomato-based gravy infused with aromatic spices and a hint of butter.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka
recipes.description: Succulent pieces of marinated chicken grilled to perfection, bursting with smoky flavors and spices. This iconic dish pairs beautifully with naan or as an appetizer.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Tender, flaky salmon fillets grilled with a zesty lemon-garlic marinade and garnished with fresh dill. A wholesome dinner option that’s as delicious as it is healthy.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pasta
recipes.description: A comforting Italian-inspired dish featuring al dente pasta tossed with sautéed zucchini, juicy tomatoes, and a hint of garlic, all lightly coated in olive oil.

recipes.title: Beef Burger
recipes.description: A hearty, juicy burger made with seasoned ground beef patties, stacked with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and melted cheese, all encased in a soft bun. A timeless favorite!

recipes.title: Egg Salad
recipes.description: A classic and creamy egg salad made with hard-boiled eggs, crisp lettuce, and a mayonnaise-based dressing, seasoned with salt and pepper for a quick and satisfying meal.

recipes.title: Shrimp Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A vibrant stir-fry combining tender shrimp with crunchy bell peppers and onions, coated in a savory soy-garlic sauce for an irresistible dinner.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: A warming and wholesome soup filled with fresh, chunky vegetables simmered in a flavorful vegetable stock. Perfect for a cozy night in.

recipes.title: Lamb Curry
recipes.description: A bold and aromatic lamb curry with tender meat cooked in a spiced tomato and onion gravy. Ideal for special occasions or when you’re craving authentic flavors.
